p: Screening measures implemented in response to Influenza Pandemic (H1N1) 2009 in Australia, Japan, Singapore and Taiwan were conducted using stationary infrared thermoscanners [ 20, 24, 26, 33, 36, 39]. In Japan ear or axillary temperature measuring devices were also used [ 24]. Entry primary screening temperature measurements in the US and exit primary screening temperature measurements in Guinea, Liberia, and Sierra Leone were conducted with handheld NCITs [ 6, 22].
